description: Please see attached Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP).",
full_summary:
================================

**Title**
----------

Decision-Support Tool for Fisheries Management for Pacific Salmon Strategy Initiative (PSSI)

**Reference Number**
-------------------

`CB-784-85783749`

**Publication Date**
-------------------

`2023-12-11`

**Solicitation Number**
----------------------

`30004600B`

**Tender Status**
-----------------

This tender has expired.

**Description**
---------------

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites proposals for the development of a decision-support tool for fisheries management within the framework of the Pacific Salmon Strategy Initiative (PSSI). This Proservices requirement will support the DFO in its efforts to sustainably manage Pacific salmon populations.
